Name: Health Potion
Description: A vial of red liquid with medicinal properties.

Name: Wild Berries
Description: A branch full of wild berries.

Name: Whetstone
Description: A special stone made for sharpening weapons.

Name: Bitter Root
Description:
A root that grows in the dark corners of the dungeon.
It tastes especially bitter.

Name: Suspicious Purple Potion
Description: A strange purple potion. You aren't sure what it does.
